languages.text: "Мы — это она. Осколки души, разбитой и проклятой. Ты не узнаешь свою слугу в новом обличьи, Домин?" {n}Отродье бесстыдно улыбается.{/n}
"We are her. We are shards of a soul that is crushed and cursed. Do you not recognise your servant in her new form, Domin?" {n}The wicked spawn never stops grinning brazenly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мы — это она. Осколки души, разбитой и проклятой. Ты не узнаешь свою слугу в новом обличьи, Домин?" {n}Отродье бесстыдно улыбается.{/n}

languages.text: «Somos ella. Somos fragmentos de un alma aplastada, maldita. ¿No reconoce a su sierva en su nueva forma, Domin?». {n}El engendro no abandona su sonrisa descarada en ningún momento.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are her. We are shards of a soul that is crushed and cursed. Do you not recognise your servant in her new form, Domin?" {n}The wicked spawn never stops grinning brazenly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Somos ella. Somos fragmentos de un alma aplastada, maldita. ¿No reconoce a su sierva en su nueva forma, Domin?». {n}El engendro no abandona su sonrisa descarada en ningún momento.{/n}
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: 「私達は彼女です。砕かれ呪われた魂の欠片なのです。新しい姿になった従者が分からないのですか、ドミン？」{n}悪魔のような新たに生まれたソレは、太々しい笑顔をずっと顔に貼り付けている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are her. We are shards of a soul that is crushed and cursed. Do you not recognise your servant in her new form, Domin?" {n}The wicked spawn never stops grinning brazenly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私達は彼女です。砕かれ呪われた魂の欠片なのです。新しい姿になった従者が分からないのですか、ドミン？」{n}悪魔のような新たに生まれたソレは、太々しい笑顔をずっと顔に貼り付けている。{/n}
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: “我们就是她，我们是她被诅咒、被粉碎的灵魂碎片。你的仆人只是变了个样子，莫非你就认不出来了吗，秘者？”{n}邪恶的怪物咧开了嘴，肆无忌惮地笑了起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are her. We are shards of a soul that is crushed and cursed. Do you not recognise your servant in her new form, Domin?" {n}The wicked spawn never stops grinning brazenly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们就是她，我们是她被诅咒、被粉碎的灵魂碎片。你的仆人只是变了个样子，莫非你就认不出来了吗，秘者？”{n}邪恶的怪物咧开了嘴，肆无忌惮地笑了起来。{/n}
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: "Wir sind hier. Wir sind die Splitter einer zerstörten und verfluchten Seele. Erkennt Ihr Eure Dienerin in ihrer neuen Form, Domin?" {n}Die teuflische Brut grinst dich noch immer hämisch an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are her. We are shards of a soul that is crushed and cursed. Do you not recognise your servant in her new form, Domin?" {n}The wicked spawn never stops grinning brazenly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind hier. Wir sind die Splitter einer zerstörten und verfluchten Seele. Erkennt Ihr Eure Dienerin in ihrer neuen Form, Domin?" {n}Die teuflische Brut grinst dich noch immer hämisch an.{/n}
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: « Nous sommes elle. Nous sommes les fragments d'une âme brisée et maudite. Vous ne reconnaissez donc pas votre servante sous sa nouvelle forme, Domin ? » {n}La créature malfaisante ne se départ pas un seul instant de son rictus bravache.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are her. We are shards of a soul that is crushed and cursed. Do you not recognise your servant in her new form, Domin?" {n}The wicked spawn never stops grinning brazenly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes elle. Nous sommes les fragments d'une âme brisée et maudite. Vous ne reconnaissez donc pas votre servante sous sa nouvelle forme, Domin ? » {n}La créature malfaisante ne se départ pas un seul instant de son rictus bravache.{/n}
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: "Biz oyuz. Bizler parçalanmış ve lanetlenmiş bir ruhun zerreleriyiz. Hizmetkârının yeni biçimini tanıyamıyor musun Domin?" {n}Habis varlık, sürekli olarak arsızca sırıtıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are her. We are shards of a soul that is crushed and cursed. Do you not recognise your servant in her new form, Domin?" {n}The wicked spawn never stops grinning brazenly.{/n}
